issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

fields.summary: Add Autoscaling Group to Troubleshooting Guide

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

When launching an Autoscaling group that spans across two availability zones (i.e. clusters), no instances are launched. 
{code}
## Creation of AS group ##
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-create-auto-scaling-group NginxCrossAZ --launch-configuration NginxLaunchConfigV2 --availability-zones ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors,SirLuciousLeftFoot --min-size 2 --max-size 4 --region account1-user01@

## Status of AS Group ##
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups NginxCrossAZ --region account1-user01@ --show-long
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	NginxCrossAZ	NginxLaunchConfigV2	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors,SirLuciousLeftFoot	2014-08-13T04:06:50.873Z		EC2	2	4	2	300	0			arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ	Default

## View of any AS group under the admin/eucalyptus account (which we should see something) ##
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instances verbose --region admin@
RESERVATION	r-3B473D83	408396244283	default
INSTANCE	i-63785AF7	emi-5FF95D61	euca-10-104-6-232.bigboi.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-18-227-10.bigboi.internal	running	account1-user01	0		c1.medium	2014-08-13T03:39:23.079Z	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors				monitoring-disabled	10.104.6.232	172.18.227.10			instance-store					hvm			sg-A5133B59				x86_64
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sde	vol-F11E05EB	2014-08-13T03:50:59.094Z	false
TAG	instance	i-63785AF7	euca:node	10.105.10.7
RESERVATION	r-614B76A7	408396244283	default
INSTANCE	i-A9512799	emi-5FF95D61	euca-10-104-6-231.bigboi.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-17-227-39.bigboi.internal	running	account1-user01	0		c1.medium	2014-08-13T03:27:00.686Z	SirLuciousLeftFoot				monitoring-disabled	10.104.6.231	172.17.227.39			instance-store					hvm			sg-A5133B59				x86_64
BLOCKDEVICE	/dev/sde	vol-361C9840	2014-08-13T03:43:42.431Z	false
TAG	instance	i-A9512799	euca:node	10.105.1.216
RESERVATION	r-8A89C769	944786667073	euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
INSTANCE	i-27E950A9	emi-6E93129B	euca-10-104-6-230.bigboi.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-18-237-252.bigboi.internal	running	euca-image-worker	0		m1.xlarge	2014-08-13T03:15:27.720Z	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors				monitoring-enabled	10.104.6.230	172.18.237.252			instance-store					hvm		358bc035-c595-42fb-ae27-9fde4db9eea8_ViciousLiesAndDangerousR_1	sg-A4E5958B			arn:aws:iam::944786667073:instance-profile/internal/imaging/imaging-worker-01	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-27E950A9	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-27E950A9	aws:autoscaling:groupName	asg-euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
TAG	instance	i-27E950A9	euca:node	10.105.1.188
{code}

In the CLC logs, the only weird output seen is the following:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# grep NginxCrossAZ /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log
Tue Aug 12 21:07:15 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#643] Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ Launch
Tue Aug 12 21:07:35 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#454] Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ Launch
Tue Aug 12 21:07:45 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#167] Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ Launch
Tue Aug 12 21:07:55 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#332] Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ Launch
Tue Aug 12 21:08:15 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#668] Not running task arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ Launch
{code}

*Signs*

* AS group instances are not seen under the admin/eucalyptus account:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region admin@
RESERVATION	r-8A89C769	944786667073	euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
INSTANCE	i-27E950A9	emi-6E93129B	euca-10-104-6-230.bigboi.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-172-18-237-252.bigboi.internal	running	euca-image-worker	0		m1.xlarge	2014-08-13T03:15:27.720Z	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors				monitoring-enabled	10.104.6.230	172.18.237.252			instance-store					hvm		358bc035-c595-42fb-ae27-9fde4db9eea8_ViciousLiesAndDangerousR_1	sg-A4E5958B			arn:aws:iam::944786667073:instance-profile/internal/imaging/imaging-worker-01	x86_64
TAG	instance	i-27E950A9	Name	euca-internal-imaging-workers
TAG	instance	i-27E950A9	aws:autoscaling:groupName	asg-euca-internal-imaging-worker-01
TAG	instance	i-27E950A9	euca:node	10.105.1.188
{code}
* AS group looks to be created from user01/account1 user perspective:
{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups NginxCrossAZ --region account1-user01@ --show-long
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	NginxCrossAZ	NginxLaunchConfigV2	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors,SirLuciousLeftFoot	2014-08-13T04:06:50.873Z		EC2	2	4	2	300	0			arn:aws:autoscaling::408396244283:autoScalingGroup:c5ed1ae3-81b9-4957-9864-eb2808c5a49d:autoScalingGroupName/NginxCrossAZ	Default
{code}
* AutoScaling component (UFS) shows the following in cloud request logs regarding the AS group in question:
{code}
[root@odc-c-11 ~]# grep NginxCrossAZ /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log*
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Aug 12 21:06:50 2014 71827312-f687-48a8-b0b7-a1d2cea98c7a arn:aws:euare::408396244283:user/user01 /10.104.10.55:34374 /10.104.10.11:8773 autoscaling CreateAutoScalingGroupType [POST,AutoScalingGroupName=NginxCrossAZ,MinSize=2,LaunchConfigurationName=NginxLaunchConfigV2,MaxSize=4,AvailabilityZones.member.2=SirLuciousLeftFoot,AvailabilityZones.member.1=ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Aug 12 21:07:22 2014 c3ccb4c6-124b-4ed6-9560-994b7059798b arn:aws:euare::408396244283:user/user01 /10.104.10.55:34546 /10.104.10.11:8773 autoscaling DescribeAutoScalingGroupsType [POST,AutoScalingGroupNames.member.1=NginxCrossAZ]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Aug 12 21:07:29 2014 59531807-73ed-489e-acef-856d7a29219b arn:aws:euare::408396244283:user/user01 /10.104.10.55:34553 /10.104.10.11:8773 autoscaling DescribeAutoScalingGroupsType [POST,AutoScalingGroupNames.member.1=NginxCrossAZ]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Aug 12 21:08:47 2014 c40e4a84-b422-4b22-8542-c0acaec6ad29 arn:aws:euare::408396244283:user/user01 /10.104.10.55:34823 /10.104.10.11:8773 autoscaling DescribeAutoScalingGroupsType [POST,AutoScalingGroupNames.member.1=NginxCrossAZ]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Aug 12 21:10:39 2014 32d5a17b-a92b-4f53-96c0-f9b0e60ffb36 arn:aws:euare::408396244283:user/user01 /10.104.10.55:35257 /10.104.10.11:8773 autoscaling DescribeAutoScalingGroupsType [POST,AutoScalingGroupNames.member.1=NginxCrossAZ]
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-requests.log.1:Tue Aug 12 21:11:43 2014 967f0a18-cd1c-4556-af15-2ed30b19ea55 arn:aws:euare::408396244283:user/user01 /10.104.10.55:35497 /10.104.10.11:8773 autoscaling DescribeAutoScalingGroupsType [POST,AutoScalingGroupNames.member.1=NginxCrossAZ]
{code}

SERVICE	ldap              	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Ldap	arn:euca:eucalyptus::ldap:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	loadbalancingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/LoadBalancingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancingbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	imaging           	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Imaging	arn:euca:eucalyptus::imaging:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	jetty             	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Jetty	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	autoscalingbackend	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/AutoScalingBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::autoscalingbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	dns               	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	cloudwatchbackend 	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/CloudWatchBackend	arn:euca:eucalyptus::cloudwatchbackend:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	notifications     	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Notifications	arn:euca:eucalyptus::notifications:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	eucalyptus        	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	configuration     	eucalyptus	10.104.10.55         	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.55:8773/services/Configuration	arn:euca:eucalyptus::configuration:10.104.10.55/
SERVICE	walrusbackend     	walrus    	Lines                	ENABLED 	36  	http://10.104.10.11:8773/services/WalrusBackend	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrusbackend:Lines/
{code}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.0.1 cloud with Eucalyptus DNS and Cloudformation enabled
# After cloud is up and running, stop all components, and add a second cluster/SC to the cloud; making it a multi-cluster deployment
# Launch a couple of instances in both clusters to make sure everything is good
# Create a AS Launch Configuration (for example)
{code}
# euscale-create-launch-config NginxLaunchConfigV2 --image-id emi-5FF95D61 --instance-type m1.medium --group nginx-scale --user-data-file nginx-cloudinit.config --region account1-user01@
{code}
# Create the AS group (for example)
{code}
euscale-create-auto-scaling-group NginxCrossAZ --launch-configuration NginxLaunchConfigV2 --availability-zones ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors,SirLuciousLeftFoot --min-size 2 --max-size 4 --region account1-user01@
{code}
_There are no warnings of any sort that inform the cloud user that there is an issue._
fields.summary: Launching AutoScaling Group That Spans Multiple Clusters (i.e. AZs) Doesn't Launch AS Instances
fields.environment:
* non-HA, multi-cluster, Managed mode
** 1 x CLC, DNS, Cloudformation
** 1 x UFS
** 1 x UFS, Walrus
** 1 x CC, SC (Overlay)
*** 2 x NCs
** 1 x CC, SC (DAS)
*** 1 x NC

comments.body:
Discussed this with [~viglesias].  The 'euscale-describe-scaling-activities' command was helpful in triaging this issue.  Currently we don't have anything in our documentation that covers how to troubleshoot AutoScaling groups in Eucalyptus. 

The issue here was that the vm.type for the EMI used in the AS Launch Configuration wasn't correct:
{code}
ACTIVITY	3e297db8-1788-4c18-b6a0-0fd84b505fb8	2014-08-13T14:01:15.868Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	cdf64ff5-e51b-456c-9078-a082cb7f8f8c	2014-08-13T14:01:15.862Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	ea2fbc59-2f7a-427c-a862-3a476d7d2561	2014-08-13T13:46:15.846Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	d1a6ff06-fc75-4cc2-b407-320da21ebc68	2014-08-13T13:46:15.799Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	2bcfc70c-4e37-449c-8599-c43e312c9496	2014-08-13T13:31:15.927Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	2ba847b7-0d82-4b46-ab7b-b79d41345d7d	2014-08-13T13:31:15.877Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	7d7d5faf-eddb-49fa-ae46-ffba8b962804	2014-08-13T13:16:05.873Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
ACTIVITY	31e91c51-2ab2-4e57-bfdf-d336b05f527f	2014-08-13T13:16:05.871Z	NginxCrossAZ	Failed	Unable to run instance emi-5FF95D61 in which the size 18467520512 bytes of the instance is greater than the vmType m1.medium size 10 GB.
...
{code}

After updating the launch config, and re-creating the AutoScaling group, everything worked:

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-create-launch-config NginxLaunchConfigV2 --image-id emi-5FF95D61 --instance-type c1.medium --user-data-file nginx-cloudinit.config --region account1-user01@
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-create-auto-scaling-group NginxCrossAZ --launch-configuration NginxLaunchConfigV2 --availability-zones ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors,SirLuciousLeftFoot --min-size 2 --max-size 4 --region account1-user01@
...
[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euscale-describe-auto-scaling-groups --region account1-user01@
AUTO-SCALING-GROUP	NginxCrossAZ	NginxLaunchConfigV2	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors,SirLuciousLeftFoot		2	4	2	Default
INSTANCE	i-ECAC613B	ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors	InService	Healthy	NginxLaunchConfigV2
INSTANCE	i-40DAA9C7	SirLuciousLeftFoot	InService	Healthy	NginxLaunchConfigV2
{code}

Will link a doc ticket to this issue to make sure AutoScaling triage is covered.
Proper triaging of Autoscaling is not documented. Need to add troubleshooting for Autoscaling groups in Troubleshooting Guide.
